body:
Thanks Jack,


That was the silver bullet!    Despite reinstalling Greg's script I  
was still getting no where.   I use Textmate for all my radiance  
scripting and perhaps it was adding a hidden character somewhere that  
the c-shell didn't like.


This is great, thanks again!


Chris
